results.title: Simvastatin addition to standard of care improves long-term survival in patients with cirrhosis after variceal bleed: An open label randomized controlled trial.
results.text_hl: Incidence of @DISEASE_Ascites @DISEASE_MESH:D001201 @@@ascites@@@(sub-distributional HR):0.60[0.39-0.92] and spontaneous @<m>DISEASE_Peritonitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010538 @@@bacterial peritonitis@@@ (sHR:0.30[0.11-0.81] was lower in @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ arm.

results.title: Efficacy and safety of coadministration of ezetimibe and statins in elderly patients with primary hypercholesterolaemia.
results.text_hl: After washout and placebo run-in period, @SPECIES_9606 @@@men@@@ and @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ >/=18 years of age (n = 1861) with @<m>DISEASE_Peritonitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010538 @@@primary hypercholesterolaemia@@@ (plasma low-density lipoprotein-cholesterol [LDL-C] level from >/=3.76 to </=6.48 mmol/L and @CHEMICAL_Triglycerides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014280 @@@triglycerides@@@ </=3.95 mmol/L) were randomised to either placebo, statin monotherapy (@CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@lovastatin@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@ 10, 20 or 40 mg, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ 10, 20, 40 or 80 mg) or @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@ plus statin for 12 weeks.

citations.NLM: Lipka L, Sager P, Strony J, Yang B, Suresh R, Veltri E, Ezetimibe Study Group. Efficacy and safety of coadministration of ezetimibe and statins in elderly patients with primary hypercholesterolaemia. Drugs Aging. 2004;21(15):1025-32. PMID: 15631531
citations.BibTeX: @article{15631531, title={Efficacy and safety of coadministration of ezetimibe and statins in elderly patients with primary hypercholesterolaemia.}, author={Lipka L and Sager P and Strony J and Yang B and Suresh R and Veltri E and Ezetimibe Study Group}, journal={Drugs Aging}, volume={21}, number={15}, pages={1025-32}}
